raw_text: robably made during the entire time ofoccupa- tion. However, the amount of pottery made was obviously very small. Our total collection of 32 fiber-tempered potsherds may be com- pared with the almost 3000 steatite vessel frag- ments recovered, or the thousands of fired-clay balls that were apparently used for cooking.
